document_name: Gender Support to the UN Country Team - Interim Progress Report 2014.docx
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/LKA/Gender Support to the UN Country Team - Interim Progress Report 2014.docx

outputs.output_descr: This project provides support to the UN Country Team to maintream gender in all their development initiatives.  The availability of support will ensure that gender issues are taken into consideration when planning and implementing all projects.  In addition the this support will also increase opportunties through which gender can be mainstreamed, so that all development initiatives focus on the importance of gender.  This project will contribute to increasing awareness of all gender related issues and contribute to the prevention of gender based violence in the wider society.  It will also contribute to increasing awareness of the wider public of gender issues and the steps that need to be taken to make a just and equitable society for all children, men and women.

project_descr: Addressing gender issues remains an integral aspect of development and a key focus of the UNDAF. This project is expected to contribute to an increased awareness of GBV issues and identify potential initiatives to be supported by the UN.
